Player History
Drafted in 23rd round, 355th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 7/7/2015, off William Kinch (NY)...
Earned first career win on 7/20/2015...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2018, winning 2 games with a 2.70 ERA...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2019, going 3-0, 1.74...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/3/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Injured on 8/8/2020 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/1/2021 to a minor league contract.
Released by Boston on 5/31/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 6/15/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
9/1/2021: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $3,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
